raw_comment: Looking at the graph, I noticed that money has somewhat of an effect on the acceptance rate of elite colleges. The biggest effect of the acceptance rates is if their parents were already in a legacy school. I wonder why if the graph was intended to show richer individuals get into elite colleges the graph is so unconsistant. I hardly know anyone who has gone to an elite college.
ace_sentences: I noticed that money has some effect on the acceptance rate of elite colleges.
I think that the biggest effect on the acceptance rate is that a parent attended the same college.
A college is a legacy school for a person if a parent of the person attended the college.
I wonder why the graph is inconsistent.
I wonder whether the graph was intended to show that richer individuals get into elite colleges.
I hardly know any person who has gone to an elite college.
